website_summaries.verdict: These chunky ear muffs are every bit as warm and comfortable as they are cute, and because they are on the larger side, they're an excellent investment for growing kids.
pros: Extra-thick ear muffs hold in warmth
Available in a wide range of attractive colors
cons: They’re a little larger than you might expect

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Warm, and Cute
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My daughter loves them. They're very comfortable and they work well to toss in her backpack because they are foldable. Soft and fuzzy, warm and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: AJM

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 10 year old daughter to stand at the bus stop in the mornings. She said they are warm and got several compliments on them! And they are really cute on her.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Keeps me daughter ears warm and are comfortable, a little bit big but wearable
customer_reviews.author: Cesar P

customer_reviews.title: No!
customer_reviews.text: 4 Stars because the ear muffs do not seem to be a child size. They are adorable and soft, but big. Don't get me wrong, they will work for my 6 year old, but not if she plans on doing a lot of moving. Also, the way the ear muffs fold up- the clip on the inside already came off and I had to clip it back. **Edit- I am tired of trying to fix these. Barely used and already had to throw them away. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: so I love them.
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as you'd expect and makes my girlfriend look ridiculous, so I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon McCustomer Face

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These rock and look soooo cute on! Great price. They are not too tight like your head's in a vice like some of these can be. Just right to keep them from sliding, but not so tight you have headache. They do muffle sound, not bad...just slightly. The white fur will become soiled with makeup, etc. so I will try to soak in sink with dawn and squeeze out when the time comes. Cheap enough to just buy a new one every year.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Would be great if it were adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I got the black rabbit earmuffs. I agree with the other reviews in that these aren’t necessarily for toddlers. They fit my head perfectly. On her, they are just too big and they’re not adjustable so I was pretty disappointed because they’re super cute. The quality seems good except for the little ears, they were flimsy and easily ripped at the seam. I gave it 4 stars because they are cute but they shouldn’t be marketed as toddler earmuffs. I wanted to use them for her 2 year pics but unfortunately I will be returning. Maybe I will buy a few years from now when she’s older or if they make it adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: KayKayBee.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cold weather
customer_reviews.text: So even though it’s not quite winter, I have used this plenty of times with this 30° Weather. I’m always cold and this keeps me to warm cause there so plushy and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Flota

customer_reviews.title: Happy Earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old granddaughter adores them so she wears them in the cold. I count that a winner
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Not kid size and the ears are flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The ears on top are quite loose. But what saddens me the most is we purchased this for our daughters birthday which was yesterday she was thrilled as these were the ones she wanted but unfortunately when she got ready for school this morning she couldn’t wear them they are HUGE meant for an adult definitely not kid size. I will be returning them as they weren’t worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Charly

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable
customer_reviews.text: These were only okay. The ears started to fall off after only a month of light use. It didn't affect function but not the quality I would expect. Also - these are not adjustable. They worked on my 9 yo but always thought they needed one or two clicks smaller but that isn't an option.
customer_reviews.author: wiznby

customer_reviews.title: Huge!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and soft, but WAY too big on kids AND adults. They are hard to keep on your head. Daughter still loves them even though they sit below her ears.
customer_reviews.author: student 09

customer_reviews.title: So so big
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 3.5yo, this is them on me. So so big, even too big for me
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cute, warm, but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and warm, but started falling apart right away. My daughter loves them but the string that goes around the horn came off. She didn’t want to send them back so I cut it off. Then the hook that holds one of the muffs keeps falling off. She may have played to much with it but at least it didn’t break off and can be put back on. She loves them still, just afte only 2 weeks I don’t have a lot of confidence that they will last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned this- doesn’t adjust for kids. Nothing against it, I just wanted it adjustable. Otherwise it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but sub-par quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these ear muffs, but the horn fell off rather quickly. Not the greatest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Lenger

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm, but a little large
customer_reviews.text: These are soft and comfortable, but for smaller heads - they are not adjustable. This isn't a big problem, just something to note. Overall, they are warm and do the job well.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves these. They are really cute, warm, and unlike some other earmuffs we shopped, the side of these that lays against her ear is flat so they stay firmly in place. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this but, after only a month of wearing them they broke. The plastic inside is very cheap and could not be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Hicken Clan

customer_reviews.title: Cute earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: Super cute earmuffs. Their a little big for my toddler (2 year old) but she can always grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Too big for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great ear muffs for my wife but definitely not kid sized. Way too big!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not super durable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but only lasted a few months when my 8 year old pulled a little too hard and the plastic broke.
customer_reviews.author: Cobyflier

customer_reviews.title: Cute but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and very soft but not durable. Item fell apart after one attempted wearing. Was able to return.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Newman

customer_reviews.title: Ear muffs
customer_reviews.text: They were great quality. These work great for the older children.
customer_reviews.author: s Mary

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect match to my daughters jacket. I was looking for something that would help with the cold without messing up her hair. The war warmers fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Too big.
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute, big huge on my 2yo. Don’t buy for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Chris&Cara

customer_reviews.title: Item broke on first wear
customer_reviews.text: Item snapped on first wear as my son went to take them off his head :( *update* customer service is great. They offered to provide a refund. I couldn’t ask for better. Will buy through this company again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Leong

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and super cute! Too bad I can’t use them anymore because of climate change :/
customer_reviews.author: Blanca J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Almost too big to wear on 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: Super cute on my daughter, and she loves them. They we're almost too big though, she can just wear them. Love the color
customer_reviews.author: persephone

customer_reviews.title: Very big
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 5 year old kid. It was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Jayapriya

customer_reviews.title: Too big :o(
customer_reviews.text: I bought gor my 2 year old...they didnt fot her head or mine. Barely fit my husbands hige head lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ear muffs!!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this my daughter and she loved it! Very soft, warm and easily folds up to compact size.
customer_reviews.author: ShilpaK

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: A little to big for my 5 year old, but she love it
customer_reviews.author: Kasia Ksepko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter. She loves them super soft. Warm made great
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bond

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: These where huge and too big for my 4 year old but they where super cute tho
customer_reviews.author: Taneshia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The earmuffs arrived on time. They look cute but extremely cheaply made. They started to fall apart only after a few hours of wearing them. Returning this item and buying from a different seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tetiana Pavlovska

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and soft... but I bought them because they are labeled as “kids” and they are WAY too big for my daughter. They’re even large on me. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Service
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these ear muffs. They are soft and comfortable. We had an issue with it and they sent us a new pair. Great service!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Should not be shown as an item for a baby
customer_reviews.text: This item was displayed as ear warmers for a baby. When they arrived, they were too big, not only for my granddaughter but they were too big for her mother. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: RMK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty little earmuffs
customer_reviews.text: These earmuffs are adorable. Soft to the touch and a soft pink color. They are quite the fashion a my granddaughter's school My granddaughter will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Les C.

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size they run very big
customer_reviews.text: These are cute looking but they advertise toddler size and they are big on me. The ya re more sized for a teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Jack MeHoff

customer_reviews.title: Very big
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and comfortable but are very big. They will fit an adult as well. Almost retuned them but decided to let them grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Biard

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Great earmuffs, just note they are not adjustable and on the large size for a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Templeman

customer_reviews.title: They're perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I was looking for! They're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Emily A Zambrotta

customer_reviews.title: -) I definitely will recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Warm! I`m look younger :-) I definitely will recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Very large size. Definitely not made for little girl's size. Soft and cute otherwise, but it fits an adult better than a child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 3 year old and they are perfect! The fit and quality are great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beckowski

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Really bad quality and they are too big for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Gonzales

product_meta.title: Simplicity Kid's Soft Plush Foldable Ear Warmers Winter Ear Muffs
feature_bullets: Incredibly soft & comfy wool blend material
Foldable headband for a compact easy storage & travel
Breathable, lightweight, & comfortable design for all day wear
Thick, plush ear warmer cushion offers extra warmth & insulation
Perfect accessory to keep your children warm & toasty throughout the chilly seasons; Great for snowboarding, skiing, sledding, ice skating, snow tubing, hiking, camping, and more
